mapper.sql: index_id, product_key, product_topic, topic_type, is_del, user_id, creat_time, modif_time, `desc`
mapper.select: select pt.index_id,pt.product_key,pt.product_topic,pt.topic_type,pt.desc from t_producttopic pt where pt.product_key= #{productKey} and pt.is_del=0
mapper.insert:
insert into t_producttopic
index_id,
product_key,
product_topic,
topic_type,
is_del,
user_id,
creat_time,
modif_time,
`desc`,
#{indexId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{productKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productTopic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{topicType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_producttopic
product_key = #{productKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_topic = #{productTopic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
topic_type = #{topicType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modif_time = #{modifTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
`desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where index_id = #{indexId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_producttopic set product_key = #{productKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_topic = #{productTopic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, topic_type = #{topicType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modif_time = #{modifTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where index_id = #{indexId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_producttopic (product_key, product_topic, topic_type, is_del, user_id, `desc`) values (#{productKey}, #{productTopic}, #{topicType}, 0, #{userId}, #{topicDescribe})
